item.title: Get started with self tracking？
item.description: This article is from：https://quantifiedself.com/get-started/ , you can read original article by clicking the link. There’s no change of content, just there’s no way to redirect to source directly. The purpose of this website is to support anybody who wants to use empirical methods to explore personal questions. We call this practice “everyday science.” In the decade that we’ve been working with people doing self-tracking projects, we’ve come to appreciate the diversity of motivations, methods and tools people use to gain insight into a problem or question using their own data.
